cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.searchToAdd: Search and add products to begin

productSearch.title: Product Search
productSearch.placeholder: Search by name, barcode or SKU...
productSearch.minCharacters: Enter at least 3 characters to search

memberSearch.minCharacters: Enter at least 3 characters to search
memberSearch.memberBannedDescription: This member has been banned and cannot be selected.

createMember.title: Add New Member
createMember.description: Enter the member's information to register them in the system.
createMember.name: Name
createMember.successDescription: {{name}} has been added as a member
createMember.errorDefault: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Complete the transaction with your preferred payment method.

instructions.debit: Please insert your debit card and follow the instructions on the EDC machine
instructions.ewallet: Please use your e-wallet app to make the payment
instructions.qris: Please scan the QR code to make the payment
instructions.transfer: Please transfer to the specified account

paymentStatus.errorDefault: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again.

validation.insufficientPaymentDescription: Payment amount must be at least Rp {{amount}}
validation.invalidDiscountDescription: The discount for {{product}} ({{discount}}) has reached its usage limit or is no longer valid
validation.invalidMemberDiscountDescription: The discount {{discount}} has reached its usage limit or is no longer valid
validation.invalidGlobalDiscountDescription: The voucher code {{discount}} has expired or reached its usage limit
validation.invalidTierDiscountDescription: The tier discount {{discount}} is no longer valid

fields.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address
fields.validPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

errors.calculatePointsDescription: An error occurred while calculating points. Please try again.

redeemCode.title: Redeem Voucher
redeemCode.tryAnotherCode: Please try another code or check for typos
redeemCode.alreadyHasDiscount: You already have a member discount applied. Remove it first to apply a voucher code.
redeemCode.memberDiscountActive: Member discount is already active. Remove it to use a voucher code.
redeemCode.memberDiscountAlreadyApplied: Member discount is already applied. Remove it to use a voucher code.
redeemCode.tierDiscountActive: Member tier discount is already active. Remove it to use a voucher code.
redeemCode.minimumPurchaseRequired: This voucher requires a minimum purchase of Rp {{amount}}
